name: Dragon Abyss
description:
General


Dragon Abyss is an exciting game in which you have to ride a dragon to conquer huge distances, dangerous enemies will stand in your way... The game is perfect for relaxing and having great fun.

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of fun with dragons and sharks.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

This is an infinity run game in which the main character riding a dragon and flying over fields and villages has to dodge enemies-sharks. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.

Features

  • Riding the Dragon.
  • Beautiful animations
  • Nice graphics
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Sharks
  • Pleasant atmosphere.
